title: I’ll Have My Seatmate Beat You - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Bullying   Cold Love Interests   Coming of Age   Cute Protagonist   Delinquents   Depression   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Doting Parents   Family   Family Conflict   First-time Interc**rse   Friendship   Heartwarming   Mismatched Couple   Modern Day   Past Trauma   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Slow Romance   Strong Love Interests
author: Kao Kao   靠靠
description:
Poor little top student was bullied by his school, so he transferred from an elite high school to an ordinary school.

School tyrant · 1.9 meters · no one dare to provoke · Brother Zhan: I cover this little brother.

Poor little · 1.7 meters · Gu Qinan: Zhan Ge is just a child. He’s poor, weak, helpless, kind and soft (hearted), I need to love him well. 

Everyone: ???

Class teacher: Zhan Ming, what kind of score is this?!

Zhan Ming: I’ll have my seatmate teach me.

Former classmates: Gu Qinan, don’t think we won’t be able to find you just because you transferred.

Gu Qinan: I’ll have my seatmate beat you.>
